text: Red Square () is a 1970 Soviet drama movie directed by Vasili Ordynsky.Какие фильмы надо показывать солдатам?КРАСНАЯ ПЛОЩАДЬ (1970) It stars Sergey Yakovlev, Aleksandr Kutepov, and Vyacheslav Shalevich. == Actors == * Sergey Yakovlev as Lenin * Aleksandr Kutepov as Yakov Sverdlov * Vyacheslav Shalevich as Nikolay Kutasov * Stanislav Lyubshin as Dmitry Amelin * Valentina Malyavina as Natasha Kutasova * Sergey Nikonenko as Volodya Koltsov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1970 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vasili Ordynsky
title: Red Square (movie)
